title-group.article-title: THE STUDY OF CONVERGENT EVOLUTION IN PLANTS AND PLANT COMMUNITIES: A QUANTITATIVE APPROACH

abstract.p: This paper briefly describes the main methodological principles developed by the authors for a series of studies on convergence between plant communities of distant areas, within the framework of an international co-operative project between the universities of London (Canada) and Trieste (Italy).
